meta.title: Texans Can Academies – GED Alternative – Charter High Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Accredited High Schools of Choice in Dallas, Fort Worth, Austin, Houston and San Antonio. Don't settle for a GED and earn your high school diploma on time!
Our mission is to provide the highest quality education for all students, especially those who have struggled in a traditional high school setting, in order to ensure their economic independence.

background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) url("https://www.texanscan.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/TCABanner2.jpg") no-repeat scroll center top;

div.p: We are firmly committed to the belief that every young person can learn. Our combination of a rigorous yet nurturing environment, outstanding teachers, and a unique teaching method allows us to help young people most would regard as the least likely to succeed.

div.h2: Focus on reading, writing, and thinking
Small class sizes for personal attention

div.p: Texans Can Academies have impacted over 151,800 student lives since 1988.
95% of students attending Texans Can Academies are economically disadvantaged.

div.i: To provide the highest quality education for all students, especially those who have struggled in a traditional high school setting, in order to ensure their economic independence.”

img.p: At Texans Can Academies we believe it is our responsibility to help our students earn their high school diplomas and step off the graduation stage with a plan and the tools for the next steps in their lives. While they are our students, and part of our family, we focus on their needs both in and out of our classrooms so that they can become productive citizens in their communities.

I watch our administrators, teachers and staff members create bright futures for children everyday in our schools. It is their goal to change lives. If you spend time talking to our students and hear what a lot of them go through every day, they will inspire you. They inspire us to never give up and do everything we can to give them the support they need to receive an excellent education.
Read More

President and CEO
Texans Can Academies

div.h2: Covid-19 Sent Them Home. You Send Them Hope
div.p: Dear Friend of Texans Can Academies, We hope you and your family are staying healthy and safe, and that you are optimistic about the future. Right now, Texans Can students are struggling more than ever. They have lost jobs. They cannot us… Read More
